name: Parametalfoes Azothress
text:
1 "Metalfoes" monster + 1 Fusion Monster
If this card is Special Summoned from the Extra Deck: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; shuffle 2 face-up Pendulum Monsters from your Extra Deck into the Main Deck, and if you do, destroy the targeted card. You can only use this effect of "Parametalfoes Azothress" once per turn. If this card in the Monster Zone is destroyed: You can place this card in your Pendulum Zone.
